posts.message:
For those asking about Python/Django books, this one is free and seems to get a very high rating and starts at the very begining, even for noobs in web development

http://chimera.labs.oreilly.com/books/1234000000754/index.html

And if you want a free development environment use this:

https://www.nitrous.io/join/8VJgm-zW4I4?utm_source=nitrous.io&utm_medium=copypaste&utm_campaign=referral

posts.message:
Bread Crumbs Studio  –Web and Mobile apps studio located at Zamalek - is looking for functional/automation software testing engineer with minimum one year experience in testing mobile apps and mobile apps based systems.
Please send your resume with email subject ‘Software Testing Engineer’ to ismail@b-c-studio.com

Egyptian Geeks group is made to share knowledge, experience even Geeks jokes can posted or shared between all our members.

Who is this group for:
- Software Engineers/Developers.
- UX / UI Designers.
- Business Analysts.
... not just Egyptians, but any Arab or Arabic speaking or those who are interested in those markets.

Things we would like to avoid in our Group:
one of the main reason that we keep our group growing is our NON-SPAM contents, helpful topics, sharing problems and solutions and YOUR Participation :) . We will appreciate your help in keeping this group SPAM FREE and into the point. such as "Ads, Non-Free Courses, etc..."

AUTO-POSTING Apps-bots are not permitted in our Group.

WE ARE NOT GOOGLE! Do your research before posting any question. Don't waist out time and efforts while you didn't do the minimum to resolve your problem.

For Job Ads, please use out Job Board:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/EgyptianGeeksJobs/

Check out our Archive:
http://egyptian-geeks.github.io/EgyptianGeeksArchive/

EGYPTIAN GEEKS

السلام عليكم
ماهي افضل طريقة برنامج لتداول الملفات داخل الشركة و حفظها باقسامها ووضع الصلاحيات لاقسام دون الاخري؟؟؟

posts.message: بما إن الجروب آخذ في الازدهار وعدده بيكبر باضطراد و فيه محتوى قيم كتير بيزيد برضه مع زيادة العدد، و حيث إن تقنية الفيسبوك قايمة على العمر الافتراضي القصير لكل بوست واللي بيصعب الوصول لمنشور قديم أو البحث العقيم اللي ما بيرجعش نتايج كويسة .. من كل هذا المنطلق، ليه ما ننقلش على منصة تانية بتحل المشاكل دي كلها زي ديسكورس مثلا؟

posts.message:
Salam ALLAH
I want to ask about Angular and SEO ?!! :)
Currently we are working on a big eCommerce website and i preferred to use Angular, signalR and some of technologies but i surprised when i got a recommendation from one of the biggest SEO companies on the glob that they asked me what about if the user disabled his java script?!!!
I got confused shall i repeat my work again to overcome that issue!!
Please advise  :(

I googled a lot before posting here but I didn't find what I'm searching for. I need some recommendations for books about architecture in general. Most of the books that I found are old and I guess will be outdated. Web servers, Caching, In-memory stores, Key value stores,  Proxies, Load balancers, Message queues, Sharding and Replication of stores. I'm really interested in this kind of posts : https://github.com/blog/530-how-we-made-github-fast & http://highscalability.com/blog/2011/3/3/stack-overflow-architecture-update-now-at-95-million-page-vi.html . The idea of thinking of and architecturing highly scalable systems and the design patterns used. Maybe what I'm asking for is too much for a single book but at least you got my point. I'd be really thankful if you could recommend some books or even the proper search keywords. Thank you.
EDIT: The closest to what I'm searching for was "Service-Oriented design with Ruby and Rails" ( http://www.amazon.com/Service-Oriented-Design-Addison-Wesley-Professional-Series/dp/0321659368 ) it contains chapters about Load balancing, caching and messaging.
